name: @nestcm/proto
description: Proto files and gRPC types for NestCM microservices

scripts.proto:generate:nestjs: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); fs.mkdirSync(path.join(__dirname, 'src', 'generated'), { recursive: true });" && npx protoc --plugin=node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto.cmd --ts_proto_out=./src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,addGrpcMetadata=true,addNestjsRestParameter=true,returnObservable=false,useOptionals=messages,outputServices=grpc-js,outputTypeRegistry=false --proto_path=./src/proto ./src/proto/*.proto
scripts.proto:clean: rimraf src/generated && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); fs.mkdirSync(path.join(__dirname, 'src', 'generated'), { recursive: true });"
scripts.proto:setup: npm run proto:clean && npm run proto:generate:nestjs

author: NestCM Team
